title: Efficiently testing multiple primes at once
summary:
The previous post looked at a technique for inverting multiple integers modÂ m at the same time, using fewer compute cycles than inverting each integer individually. This post will do something analogous for prime chains, revisiting a post from a few days ago about testing prime chains. A prime chain is a sequence of primes in […]

The post Efficiently testing multiple primes at once first appeared on John D. Cook.
